fields.name: Configuration
fields.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: User defined description for this WebTest.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Is the test actively being monitored.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: Interval in seconds between test runs for this WebTest. Default value is 300.

fields.name: Kind
fields.description: The kind of web test this is, valid choices are ping, multistep and standard.

fields.name: Locations
fields.description: A list of where to physically run the tests from to give global coverage for accessibility of your application.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: User defined name if this WebTest.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Current state of this component, whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Succeeded, Deploying, Canceled, and Failed.

fields.name: RetryEnabled
fields.description: Allow for retries should this WebTest fail.

fields.name: SyntheticMonitorId
fields.description: Unique ID of this WebTest. This is typically the same value as the Name field.

fields.name: Timeout
fields.description: Seconds until this WebTest will timeout and fail. Default value is 30.

fields.name: ValidationRules
fields.description: The collection of validation rule properties
